channel.title: Donator PIN

item.title: Donator PIN
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

writeLog(playerLastConnect, “pins.txt”);

BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(“config//pins.txt”));

for this to work out, you need a notepad called pins.txt Oh and it needs to be in the config folder ;D

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Use the BufferedReader class and the readLine() method to check the line in the file, then the PrintWriter class to remove it.

item.title: Donator PIN
item.dc:creator: @1337_pow3r 1337 pow3r
item.description:
@1337_pow3r wrote:

Alright, well I want to make a Donator PIN here’s the command that came with the server:

[code][B]if (command.startsWith(“claim”) && command.length() > 10 && playerRights < 3)
{

String pin = command.substring(6);

if (checkLog(“points”, pin) && (freeSlots()>1))
{
removepin(“points”,pin);
if (checkLog(“points”, pin)) {
return;
}
donorPoints += 5;
donator = 1;
writeLog(""+playerName+" claimed 5 DONORPOINTS with pin: "+pin, “rewards”);
disconnected = true;
}
else
{
sM(“ERROR! Please contact 1337 pow3r @ itsmehiphop700@hotmail.com”);
}
}[/B][/code]

I want to make it where I could put the Pins.txt in the Config folder and I could put like 12343556 in the Pins.txt and the player would type ::claim 12343556 and then 12343556 would get deleted from the .txt so it can’t be re-used, Help please?

Read full topic
